scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(![20,22].includes(parseInt(process.versions.node))) {console.log('\x1b[31mERROR: Unsupported Node.js version. Please use Node.js 20 or 22\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1)}"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-node-snapshot yarn workspaces foreach -A --include backend --include app --parallel --jobs unlimited -v -i run start
scripts.dev:env: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-node-snapshot yarn workspaces foreach -A --include backend --include app --parallel --jobs unlimited -v -i run start:env
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-node-snapshot yarn workspace app start
scripts.start-backend: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-node-snapshot yarn workspace backend start
scripts.start-backend:env: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-node-snapshot node -r dotenv/config node_modules/.bin/backstage-cli package start
